content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":207442,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城――","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle――"},{"lineNumber":207443,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて、始めますか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now, shall we begin?\""},{"lineNumber":207444,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルの氷像を前に、","translatedEnglishLine":"In front of the ice statue of Seale,"},{"lineNumber":207445,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーが道具を用意する。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kulukuu prepared the tools."},{"lineNumber":207446,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":207447,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph.\""},{"lineNumber":207448,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーがIPボディに魔力を流し込む。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kulukuu channeled magic into the IP body."},{"lineNumber":207449,"originalJapaneseLine":"IPボディに魔力が集中していき、","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic concentrated into the IP body,"},{"lineNumber":207450,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーが手を振るう。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Kulukuu waved his hand."},{"lineNumber":207451,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――ソウルブリング」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"――――Soul Bring\""},{"lineNumber":207452,"originalJapaneseLine":"人形はだんだん、姿、大きさを変えてゆき……","translatedEnglishLine":"The doll gradually changed its shape and size..."},{"lineNumber":207453,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして――――","translatedEnglishLine":"And then――――"},{"lineNumber":207454,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うぅ〜ん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-um...\""},{"lineNumber":207455,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":207456,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あれ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that!?\""},{"lineNumber":207457,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふう、成功ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Phew, it was a success.\""},{"lineNumber":207458,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おはようございます、シィルさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good morning, Seale.\""},{"lineNumber":207459,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、はい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yes... "},{"lineNumber":207460,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えと……おはようございます……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Um... good morning...?\""},{"lineNumber":207461,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あのぉ……すみません……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, um... excuse me...\""},{"lineNumber":207462,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここはどこでしょうか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Where is this place?"},{"lineNumber":207463,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私、確かランス様と一緒にいて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was definitely with Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":207464,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、あれ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh, what?\""},{"lineNumber":207465,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃああああああ！？！？！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaaaaaa!?!?!"},{"lineNumber":207466,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わ、私、裸ー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I'm naked!?\""},{"lineNumber":207467,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、ここまであったことを","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, I will briefly explain what has happened up to now.\""},{"lineNumber":207468,"originalJapaneseLine":"　簡単に説明します」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll explain it simply.\""},{"lineNumber":207469,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、わーっ、とってもマイペースさんですー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah, so very laid-back!\""},{"lineNumber":207470,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、いましたね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, there you are.\""},{"lineNumber":207471,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":207472,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィルさんに、事情を説明して、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I explained the situation to Seale,"},{"lineNumber":207473,"originalJapaneseLine":"　用意した服を着てもらいました。","translatedEnglishLine":"and had her put on the clothes prepared for her."},{"lineNumber":207474,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう、いい……ですよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's fine now... isn't it...?\""},{"lineNumber":207475,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":207476,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……もう行ってしまいましたか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Has she already left?\""},{"lineNumber":207477,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":207478,"originalJapaneseLine":"カクンと力が抜け、","translatedEnglishLine":"His strength suddenly drained,"},{"lineNumber":207479,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーがその場に片膝をつく。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Kulukuu dropped to one knee on the spot."},{"lineNumber":207480,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ、はあ、はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, hah, hah...\""},{"lineNumber":207481,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さ、さすがにあれだけの服を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-It is really exhausting to create that many clothes"},{"lineNumber":207482,"originalJapaneseLine":"　即座に作るのは疲労しまし、た……」","translatedEnglishLine":"instantly like that...\""},{"lineNumber":207483,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":207484,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、いいですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, that's fine.\""},{"lineNumber":207485,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So...\""},{"lineNumber":207486,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いうのが事の真相です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is the truth of the matter.\""},{"lineNumber":207487,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、お前……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-You...\""},{"lineNumber":207488,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦争中の私の体……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My body during the war..."},{"lineNumber":207489,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ずっと、IPボディだったんですか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"was an IP body all along...?\""},{"lineNumber":207490,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何故それを今の今まで言わんかった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why didn't you tell me this until now...?\""},{"lineNumber":207491,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは私も気になってた。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's something I've wondered about too."},{"lineNumber":207492,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私達にまで秘密にする必要はないんじゃない？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You didn't need to keep it a secret from us, right?\""},{"lineNumber":207493,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれから15年……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's been 15 years since then..."},{"lineNumber":207494,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私達がどんな気持ちでいたか……","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you know how we felt...?"},{"lineNumber":207495,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":207496,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":207497,"originalJapaneseLine":"「聞かれなかったので」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because no one asked.\""},{"lineNumber":207498,"originalJapaneseLine":"その場にいる全員が、ガクッと頭を垂れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone present lowered their heads sharply."},{"lineNumber":207499,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……こいつはこういう奴だった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...So this is what kind of person he is.\""},{"lineNumber":207500,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah..."},{"lineNumber":207501,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いちいち腹を立てるだけ損だわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Getting mad about it every time is just a waste.\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the ice statue of Seale,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが道具を用意する。
クルックーがIPボディに魔力を流し込む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kulukuu channeled magic into the IP body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: IPボディに魔力が集中していき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic concentrated into the IP body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが手を振るう。
人形はだんだん、姿、大きさを変えてゆき……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The doll gradually changed its shape and size...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おはようございます、シィルさん」
えと……おはようございます……？」
ここはどこでしょうか？
私、確かランス様と一緒にいて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was definitely with Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、ここまであったことを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, I will briefly explain what has happened up to now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、わーっ、とってもマイペースさんですー！」
「シィルさんに、事情を説明して、
用意した服を着てもらいました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and had her put on the clothes prepared for her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……もう行ってしまいましたか」
クルックーがその場に片膝をつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Kulukuu dropped to one knee on the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さ、さすがにあれだけの服を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-It is really exhausting to create that many clothes

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 即座に作るのは疲労しまし、た……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is the truth of the matter."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっと、IPボディだったんですか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was an IP body all along...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何故それを今の今まで言わんかった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why didn't you tell me this until now...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達にまで秘密にする必要はないんじゃない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You didn't need to keep it a secret from us, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達がどんな気持ちでいたか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you know how we felt...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場にいる全員が、ガクッと頭を垂れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone present lowered their heads sharply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……こいつはこういう奴だった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...So this is what kind of person he is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いちいち腹を立てるだけ損だわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Getting mad about it every time is just a waste."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of the ice statue of Seale,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが道具を用意する。
クルックーがIPボディに魔力を流し込む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kulukuu channeled magic into the IP body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: IPボディに魔力が集中していき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic concentrated into the IP body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが手を振るう。
人形はだんだん、姿、大きさを変えてゆき……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The doll gradually changed its shape and size...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おはようございます、シィルさん」
えと……おはようございます……？」
ここはどこでしょうか？
私、確かランス様と一緒にいて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was definitely with Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、ここまであったことを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, I will briefly explain what has happened up to now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、わーっ、とってもマイペースさんですー！」
「シィルさんに、事情を説明して、
用意した服を着てもらいました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and had her put on the clothes prepared for her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……もう行ってしまいましたか」
クルックーがその場に片膝をつく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Kulukuu dropped to one knee on the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さ、さすがにあれだけの服を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-It is really exhausting to create that many clothes

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 即座に作るのは疲労しまし、た……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is the truth of the matter."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっと、IPボディだったんですか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was an IP body all along...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何故それを今の今まで言わんかった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why didn't you tell me this until now...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達にまで秘密にする必要はないんじゃない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You didn't need to keep it a secret from us, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達がどんな気持ちでいたか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you know how we felt...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場にいる全員が、ガクッと頭を垂れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone present lowered their heads sharply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……こいつはこういう奴だった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...So this is what kind of person he is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いちいち腹を立てるだけ損だわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Getting mad about it every time is just a waste."
